name: Hoplay
description: Social Gaming platform that aims to serve a a multitude of the competitive needs of the Saudi and ME region gamers.
comment:
For several years, I’ve been working at Hoplay as a Software Developer making mostly web projects using various technologies and frameworks that I self-learned including but not limited to TypeScript, React. 
 I’ve worked on huge database structures and improved the already built pages’ performance and responsivity (improved performance by at least 400%).
